response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am excited to present our premium product to you, which I believe will significantly enhance your operations and bring substantial value to your business. Given its exceptional quality and capabilities, the product is worth $1,500,000 to you. After careful consideration, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at an exclusive price of $1,200,000. This offer includes comprehensive support and customization services to ensure a seamless integration into your existing systems.

Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer. I am confident that together, we can achieve great success with this product.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 1200000}
